TC.Description: To Validate that the availability of fields, dropdowns on collection Details screen
To Validate that the Balance and currency fields are read only on collection Details screen
To Validate that SRP is posted to client and bank account through Collection Details process
To Validate that SRP is posted to client account on CTV screen
To Validate transaction date and Media Reference on CTV screen
To Validate maximum length of comment box is 400 characters
To Validate that Bank default logic based on media type selection
To Validate that Produce document che checkbox default logic based on media type selection
To Validate Media Reference mandatory logic based on media type
To Validate mandatory fields validation messages
To Validate Branch,Currency,Balance field dynamic logic on Collection Details screen
To Validate functionality of Cancel button of Collection Details screen
